section.heading: Information reporting.
section.text: Within 3 days after the Mayor's receipt of the transcript of proceedings relating to the issuance of the bonds, the Mayor shall transmit a copy of the transcript to the Secretary to the Council.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-263: § 16 of D.C. Law 22-263 provided that the creation of this section by § 14 of D.C. Law 22-263 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
